G2Plot 2.0 Upgrade guide

Abandoned charts

  • g2Bubble -> g2Scatter
  • g2StackedColumn -> g2Column
  • g2GroupedColumn -> g2Column
  • g2PercentStackedColumn -> g2Column
  • g2RangeColumn -> g2Column
  • g2StackedBar -> g2Bar
  • g2PercentStackedBar -> g2Bar
  • g2RangeBar -> g2Bar
  • g2Donut -> g2Pie
  • g2DualLine -> g2DualAxes
  • g2ColumnLine -> g2DualAxes
  • g2StackedColumnLine -> g2DualAxes
  • g2GroupedColumnLine -> g2DualAxes
  • g2StackedArea -> g2Area
  • g2PercentStackedArea -> g2Area
  • g2StepLine -> g2Line

parameter

  • g2Column
  • g2Bar
  • g2Pie
  • g2Area
  • g2Line
  • g2DualAxes

Configuration change

G2Plot 2.0 is compatible with most of the chart functions and configuration items of version 1.x. The details are as follows:

General attributes

  • title deprecated
  • description deprecated
  • forceFit deprecated, use autoFit instead
  • responsive deprecated, built-in
  • guideLine deprecated, use annotations instead
  • label label.type may has compatibility issues, if the error is reported, modify/remove the type configuration
  • slider Syntax change
  • scrollbar Syntax change
  • events Syntax change
  • visible Syntax change
  • animation Syntax change

Private configuration

  • Scatter
  • Rose
  • Bullet
  • WordCloud
  • Gauge
  • Liquid
  • Radar
  • TinyArea, TinyColumn, TinyLine
